name: Meteor Shower
effect: function() { const bonusCoins = 500; this.coinCount += bonusCoins; alert(`A meteor shower rained down ${bonusCoins} coins!`); this.updateCoinCount(); }

name: Thief Encounter
effect: function() { const lostCoins = Math.floor(this.coinCount * 0.2); this.coinCount -= lostCoins; alert(`A thief stole ${lostCoins} coins!`); this.updateCoinCount(); }
